Control Name: Business Associate Contracts and Other Arrangements  Written Contract or Other Arrangement - 164.308(b)(3)
Control Family: Business Associate Contracts and Other Arrangements
Control Statement: Document the satisfactory assurances required by paragraph (b)(1) or (b)(2) of this section through a written contract or other arrangement with the business associate that meets the applicable requirements of \u00a7164.314(a).
